desc: Holistic Habitat Curates Modern Refined Bohemian Home Decor & Accessories for the socially conscious consumer. We offer pillows, textiles, furniture, art, planters, vintage, rugs, wall hangings, storage, baskets, vases, pottery, handmade decor. Affordably Sourced, globally and locally. Flat rate & FREE shipping.

layout.text: Home Decor for You, the Socially Conscious.
We curate home decor with an impact far beyond your home.
